name: The Ranch (Thanos Makaronas)
description:
Can you survive the night? Can you protect your Ranch and your wife?

You play as Frank, a farmer and owner of a huge Ranch, where he lives with his wife Betty. During the night, hordes of creepy scarecrows (or simple Crows) attack the Ranch and try to kill you and your wife. Will you be able to survive? 

The Ranch is an FPS, wave survival game, that was designed and developed as part of final assignment for the Game Design Program in SAE Athens Institute.

It's currently in the alpha phase.
